entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
